{{ddcl|header=chrono|since=c++20|
template&lt; class CharT &gt;
struct formatter&lt;std::chrono::hh_mm_ss, CharT&gt;;
}}

{{lc|std::formatter}} 的特化，定义 {{lc|std::chrono::hh_mm_ss}} 的格式化规则。

通常不直接访问，而是通过[[cpp/utility/format|格式化函数]]使用 {{lc|std::formatter}} 特化。

===格式说明===
{{cpp/chrono/format spec begin}}
{{cpp/chrono/format spec rows/time}}
{{cpp/chrono/format spec fail}}
{{cpp/chrono/format spec rows/year}}
{{cpp/chrono/format spec rows/month}}
{{cpp/chrono/format spec rows/day}}
{{cpp/chrono/format spec rows/weekday}}
{{cpp/chrono/format spec rows/date}}
{{cpp/chrono/format spec rows/count}}
{{cpp/chrono/format spec rows/zone}}
{{cpp/chrono/format spec rows/others}}
{{cpp/chrono/format spec end}}

===示例===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;chrono&gt;
#include &lt;format&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
using namespace std::literals;

int main()
{
    std::chrono::hh_mm_ss c{16h + 32min + 10s};

    std::cout &lt;&lt; "%R: " &lt;&lt; std::format("{:%R}", c) &lt;&lt; '\n'
              &lt;&lt; "%T: " &lt;&lt; std::format("{:%T}", c) &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|output=
%R: 16:32
%T: 16:32:10
}}
